221268","dweb:/ipfs/QmWch2VLwSetZEfV3bdk9eQjefJnH3MzevCSvEEAvwouFP"]},"contracts/mgv_src/preprocessed/MgvOffer.post.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4dcea46a1a9b3f5b9f558a26069759c469343753c9efa9b7dff9f995ee5ce243","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://68965bccb8beac5dd32191c8a53f3abdc066e227ba431ca61eea75cb78f0cfcf","dweb:/ipfs/QmSxeq4BXR4JoBuENePbuxpY7FC5HSYhJ2jkSra6SRiowm"]},"contracts/mgv_src/preprocessed/MgvOfferDetail.post.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3aea9ecdfe114c4f910faba5b80d0963aa70dd5662f2bd1fccc384a0c0b9431c","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://d7145abb79ab585f2d8f48d1489ff4ba754e993d4b2e63d5d87c06ac1bf809ee","dweb:/ipfs/QmY8r2MEhqfgyAVDrBLiuiiw5TRmHH3aCFgdQibbvwygzr"]},"contracts/mgv_src/preprocessed/MgvStructs.post.sol":{"keccak256":"0x28ffca76979944639bb5f37d50bd0caecdac579a149f3b9150091df8e9b66d27","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://c5303ede9cd25185e35afa2db7f91424116b0c46e7c9d10637237d5363a12e81","dweb:/ipfs/QmZPUvYAWFR4bb9FgKhQSXoNRGweDoxFAeS1bADxtyPE1c"]},"contracts/mgv_src/strategies/routers/AbstractRouter.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0db936ae576edbba84ab8b425cb78d23105303d64f953011966c353ca2f59d29","license":"BSD-2-Clause","urls":["bzz-raw://76500585b56269424eff8185ea947f407041616bd9b2c61b04e792288ce702b5","dweb:/ipfs/QmQs2hoQ36NNSByLM25xtR2SeTJ5ayQQRaDuCaH3KdjX2Z"]},"contracts/mgv_src/strategies/utils/AccessControlled.sol":{"keccak256":"0x053207572e7cf0b1d184a87b79335fc17d4fd8f39fdafe3b5ca0144f883d11ff","license":"BSD-2-Clause","urls":["bzz-raw://f12e957c7b9189840fbb973c7e2ee0b2904ecaf590c87ed1032696ad6baa25a3","dweb:/ipfs/QmcxNemmZAPHVRvSTF5SisXqXKwABvLnseETZzR7VHKinh"]}},"version":1}

params.token: the asset one wishes to use the router for
the asset one wishes to know the balance of

bind(address).details: this function is callable by router's admin to bootstrap, but later on an allowed maker contract can add another address

checkList(address,address).details: `checkList` returns normally if all needed approval are strictly positive. It reverts otherwise with a reason.

params.reserveId: of the tokens that are being pulled
params.token: is the asset (and possibly its overlyings) whose approval must be checked

params.routerGasreq_: is the amount of gas that is required for this router to be able to perform a `pull` and a `push`.

params.reserveId: determines the location of the reserve (router implementation dependent).

params.mkr: the address of a maker contract

returns._0: true if `mkr` is authorized to call this router.

params.amount: of `token` the maker contract wishes to pull from its reserve
params.reserveId: identifies the fund owner (router implementation dependent).
params.strict: when the calling maker contract accepts to receive more funds from reserve than required (this may happen for gas optimization)
params.token: is the ERC20 managing the pulled asset

returns.pulled: the amount that was successfully pulled.

params.amount: is the amount of asset that should be transferred from the calling maker contract
params.reserveId: determines the location of the reserve (router implementation dependent).
params.token: is the asset the maker is pushing

returns.pushed: fraction of `amount` that was successfully pushed to reserve.

returns.overhead: the added (overapproximated) gas cost of `push` and `pull`.

activate(address).notice: performs necessary approval to activate router function on a particular asset

bind(address).notice: adds a maker contract address to the allowed makers of this router

checkList(address,address).notice: allows a makerContract to verify it is ready to use `this` router for a particular reserve

flush(address[],address).notice: iterative `push` for the whole balance in a single call

isBound(address).notice: getter for the `makers: addr => bool` mapping

pull(address,address,uint256,bool).notice: pulls liquidity from the reserve and sends it to the calling maker contract.

push(address,address,uint256).notice: pushes assets from calling's maker contract to a reserve

routerGasreq().notice: view for gas overhead of this router.

setAdmin(address).notice: This sets the admin. Only the current admin can change the admin.

unbind().notice: removes `msg.sender` from the allowed makers of this router

unbind(address).notice: removes a makerContract from the allowed makers of this router

documentation.text: @notice the amount of gas that is required for this router to be able to perform a `pull` and a `push`.
@notice the bound maker contracts which are allowed to call this router.
@notice This modifier verifies that `msg.sender` an allowed caller of this router.
@notice This modifier verifies that `msg.sender` is the admin or an allowed caller of this router.

@notice logging bound maker contract
@param maker the maker address

@notice logging unbound maker contract
@param maker the maker address

@notice constructor for abstract routers.
@param routerGasreq_ is the amount of gas that is required for this router to be able to perform a `pull` and a `push`.

@notice view for gas overhead of this router.
@return overhead the added (overapproximated) gas cost of `push` and `pull`.

@notice removes a maker contract address from the allowed makers of this router
@param makerContract the maker contract address
@notice removes `msg.sender` from the allowed makers of this router

@notice removes a makerContract from the allowed makers of this router
@param makerContract the maker contract address

@notice performs necessary approval to activate router function on a particular asset
@param token the asset one wishes to use the router for

@notice router-dependent implementation of the `activate` function
@param token the asset one wishes to use the router for

@title AbstractRouter
 @notice Partial implementation and requirements for liquidity routers.
